price: 139. Ya sólo, baye wana, maye bazali kobondela ezali mabe, mpe nyoso bazali kosala ezali na ntina te (ezanga litomba).
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مُتَبَّرٞ مَّا هُمۡ فِيهِ وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi mutabbarun mā hum fīhi wabāṭilun mā kānū yaʿmalūna
